# Loading in through Import on the side ->
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

Hey so what's here
```{r}
colnames(mentalHealthDat)
```


Best graph first
```{r}
ggplot(mentalHealthDat, aes(stressLevel, fill=as.factor(cortisolLevel)))+
  geom_bar()+
  theme_bw()+
  xlab("\nStress Level")+
  ylab("\nResponses")+
  ggtitle("Stress Level by Cortisol Level")
```

Now the worst one
```{r}
ggplot(mentalHealthDat, aes(stressLevel, cortisolLevel))+
  geom_point(color = "white", size = 1, shape = 8)+
  theme_bw()+
  geom_jitter(color = "white", size =1, shape=8)+
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#00272B"))+
  geom_smooth(method="lm", size=20, color="white")
```
